and he hoped -> there : 1

outside he could -> see : 1

in the storm -> blackened : 1

storm blackened had -> thought : 1
blackened had thought -> to : 1
had thought to -> await : 1
thought to await -> it : 1
to await it -> staring : 1
await it staring -> out : 1
it staring out -> across : 1
across the lake -> destruction : 1
the lake destruction -> and : 1
lake destruction and -> beauty : 1

the museum was -> his : 1
museum was his -> smiled : 1
was his smiled -> at : 1
his smiled at -> the : 1
at the had -> found : 1
the had found -> love : 1

many he had -> found : 1

found he had -> found : 1
had found what -> he : 1
found what he -> felt : 1
he felt was -> varakov : 1

was varakov held -> catherine : 1
varakov held catherine -> more : 1

catherine more closely -> to : 1
